team.title: The Team
team.intro: We are a lean, high-performing team dedicated to improving the digital experience for the citizens of Connecticut. We bring to bear a diverse set of skills and experience to achieve this mission.
team.body:
Our team is at the front end of a digital transformation journey that seeks to make it simple and easy to interact with the government. We are curious, supportive and driven in our efforts to solve complex problems that yield smart, user-centered digital services.  

We are looking to grow our talented and scrappy team. If you are interested in joining, please review the open roles below.

openings.title: Open Roles
openings.intro: Interested in harnessing your tech superpowers to transform the digital experience of our users? Check out the open roles on our team below. We look forward to hearing from you!
